about_the_game:
Up Square is a casual yet demanding precision platformer with challenging caves, diverse environments and both solo and multiplayer modes!

Features

  • Physics-Based Movement: Every jump should be precise as colliding with walls at the wrong angle, or being pushed by effects like wind, might send you down into lava.
  • Endless Cave Levels: The world of Up Square features procedurally generated caves that change with every playthrough to offer a unique challenge every time.
  • Diverse Biomes: Face the elements as you climb through different biomes with wind, blizzards, slippery surfaces and rising lava, adding an additional challenge to every jump.
  • Artistic Abstraction: Immerse yourself in the minimalistic and abstract art style that adds a charm to your journeys.

Singleplayer Challenges

  • Endless Mode Leaderboards: Compete with other players for the highest score in different categories to show off your skills.
  • Challenge Mode: Solve and unlock increasingly difficult challenges with various restrictions and goals to unlock achievements.

Multiplayer

  • Challenge Your Friends: Compete with your friends or other players in a variety of of game modes, each with a unique set of rules and objectives.
  • Rich Variety Of Options: Customize each multiplayer session with a wide range of options to adjust the cave generation, scoring modes and objectives.
  • AI Players: Fill empty slots with AI players to always have a full lobby or practice your skills.
  • Up To 16 Players: The final amount is yet to be determined.
detailed_description:
Up Square is a casual yet demanding precision platformer with challenging caves, diverse environments and both solo and multiplayer modes!

Features

  • Physics-Based Movement: Every jump should be precise as colliding with walls at the wrong angle, or being pushed by effects like wind, might send you down into lava.
  • Endless Cave Levels: The world of Up Square features procedurally generated caves that change with every playthrough to offer a unique challenge every time.
  • Diverse Biomes: Face the elements as you climb through different biomes with wind, blizzards, slippery surfaces and rising lava, adding an additional challenge to every jump.
  • Artistic Abstraction: Immerse yourself in the minimalistic and abstract art style that adds a charm to your journeys.

Singleplayer Challenges

  • Endless Mode Leaderboards: Compete with other players for the highest score in different categories to show off your skills.
  • Challenge Mode: Solve and unlock increasingly difficult challenges with various restrictions and goals to unlock achievements.

Multiplayer

  • Challenge Your Friends: Compete with your friends or other players in a variety of of game modes, each with a unique set of rules and objectives.
  • Rich Variety Of Options: Customize each multiplayer session with a wide range of options to adjust the cave generation, scoring modes and objectives.
  • AI Players: Fill empty slots with AI players to always have a full lobby or practice your skills.
  • Up To 16 Players: The final amount is yet to be determined.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space

name: Up Square

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz+
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit
  • Processor: Quad Core 2.5GHz+
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Up Square: A minimalistic, physics based, precision platformer, with unique biomes. Climb to the top of the leaderboard, complete difficult challenges for achievements and challenge your friends in various game modes!
supported_languages: English, German, Japanese, Korean, Simplified Chinese
